BR_text.BRdescription:
HybridBeamSearchSampler can no longer correctly infer shape:
 <denchmark-link:http://ci.mxnet.io/blue/organizations/jenkins/GluonNLP-py3-master-cpu-unittest/detail/PR-705/7/pipeline/>http://ci.mxnet.io/blue/organizations/jenkins/GluonNLP-py3-master-cpu-unittest/detail/PR-705/7/pipeline/</denchmark-link>
 
 in PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dmlc/gluon-nlp/pull/705>#705</denchmark-link>
 
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/junrushao1994>@junrushao1994</denchmark-link>
  do you have any idea?

comments_0.comment_text: May be related to the recent dynamic shape PR which removes shape inference on control flow operators. Will look into it!
